current.popup_brochure_info: Request a free brochure by completing the form below. Submit before 3pm Monday to Friday and your brochure will be delivered through your door the very next day.

settings.title: beds
settings.text: Choose from our three bed types, or view all hospital-type beds.

settings.title: adjustable-beds
settings.heading: Adjustable Beds
settings.text: Adjustable beds with back and leg rest adjustment and smart comfort technology.

settings.title: profiling-care-beds
settings.heading: Profiling Care Beds
settings.text: Profiling beds with height, back and leg rest adjustment for nursing and support.

settings.title: rotating-chair-beds
settings.heading: Rotating Chair Beds
settings.text: Rotating beds that turn from a flat position into an upright chair to ease access.

settings.title: pressure-care-mattresses
settings.heading: Pressure Care Mattresses
settings.text: Static, dynamic and hybrid pressure surfaces designed to prevent and treat bed sores.

settings.title: autoturn-lateral-turning-system
settings.heading: Automated Lateral Turning
settings.text: A lateral turning system that redistributes pressure with automated user turning.

settings.title: adjustable-comfort-mattresses
settings.heading: Adjustable Comfort Mattresses
settings.text: Maximise comfort with wools, pocket springs, high-tech foams, cooling gels and more.

settings.title: riser-recliner-chairs
settings.heading: Riser Recliner Chairs
settings.text: Consider a chair to go with your bed. Recline for comfort and rise to ease access.

settings.title: care-bed-accessories
settings.heading: Care Bed Accessories
settings.text: Compliment your care bed with overbed tables, grab rails, positioning aids and more.

settings.title: bedding
settings.heading: Bedding
settings.text: Dress your bed with fitted stretch sheets, mattress protectors and pillows.

settings.heading: 'The difference my Opera bed has made is amazing'

settings.title: Extensive Stock & Logistics Network for Rapid UK-Wide Delivery & Setup
Adjustable Beds
settings.description: Adjustable beds with back and leg rest adjustment, smart technology and an array of lifestyle benefits.

settings.title: Care Beds
settings.description: Profiling care beds with height, back and leg rest adjustment designed to support nursing and ease access.

settings.embed: Trustpilot

settings.title: Elena Frasergreen | Family Member
settings.heading: Faultless
settings.text: An adjustable bed and chair were delivered within 24 hours and have made an enormous difference to my Mother's comfort and quality of life. I can't recommend Opera enough.

settings.title: Gabbie | User
settings.heading: Love My New Bed
settings.text: Helpful advice from Harry about which version of the Adjustable Beds would suit me. End result is I'm very pleased with my new bed and it is such a treat to have a massage and float with Zero Gravity every day! Sleep quality has improved as well.

settings.title: Anita Wales | User
settings.heading: Very comfortable and looks stylish
settings.text: The bed is fantastic, very comfortable and looks stylish too. Has the functions needed to help with moving but looks like a normal bed. The service from ordering the bed to the delivery of the bed was fantastic too. The delivery men were very professional and gave a full demonstration of how the bed works.

settings.title: Terrance Raymond Richards | Family Member
settings.heading: The Bed Itself is of High Quality
settings.text: A quick delivery. The bed was easy to assemble. Got the second mattress in the selection and my Dad finds it very comfortable and he is getting better uninterrupted sleep. The bed itself is of high quality and the side rails are built to last. The controller also has a good length cable connecting to the bed, which allows me to place it out of the way for my Dad's transfers in and out of bed. I am more than happy to have chosen both products.

settings.title: Leanne Sargent | Family Member
settings.heading: Perfect Bed for My Sons Needs
settings.text: We have been searching for a bed for some time that didn’t look like a ‘hospital bed’ for our very fussy 18 year old son who has Cerebral Palsy. After speaking to the Opera we decided on one of their profiling care beds and my son loves it. It’s perfect for not only his needs but ours as carers too. It’s also very stylish and doesn’t look like a hospital bed!!

settings.title: Richard | User
settings.heading: Great Looking Bed
settings.text: Great looking bed, Doesn't even look like a hospital bed.

settings.title: E Lunn | Family Member
settings.heading: Looks Nothing Like a Hospital Bed
settings.text: Ordered the Signature bed for our Mum who has advanced dementia. It’s perfect for her needs but looks great also. Mum was worried about having a bed that looks too clinical. The Signature is a good colour and design and nothing like a hospital bed Mum was so worried about.

settings.title: Michael Fendyke | Family Member
settings.heading: This is a Fantastic Company
settings.text: I needed a bed for my poorly wife, but I needed it urgent. Ordered at 8am, arrived by 11am assembled by 1pm ready for her arrival from hospital. The bed itself is comfortable for her and the engineer of it is first class, and I say this as an engineer myself. Value for money 10/10. Thanks guys.

settings.title: KL | Family Member
settings.heading: Amazing Customer Service
settings.text: Amazing customer service from start to finish, very informative and helpful as I had no idea where to start. Was kept up to date with delivery updates and the staff are very knowledgeable of their products. They don't come across as "sales focused" which is always a positive! My Aunty's sleep has improved massively since she received the Signature Profiling bed. Well worth the money!

settings.title: Helen | Family Member
settings.heading: Exceptional Service Throughout
settings.text: The service has been exceptional service throughout every stage of the process and having a bed that caters to my mum’s medical needs while looking like a bed for a home, really makes all the difference! Don’t hesitate to use Opera Beds! Thank you.

settings.title: Claire Greenslade | User
settings.heading: Very Helpful Service
settings.text: We needed the bed quickly and Opera Beds supplied it within a week. Very helpful service.

settings.title: Juliet Lewis | User
settings.heading: Excellent, efficient service
settings.text: Very prompt delivery. Excellent communication. Rang me to ensure I was getting the correct mattress for my partner & talking through delivery & setup. Would recommend.

settings.title: Theresa C | Broome Park Nursing Home
settings.heading: Opera Beds Are a Great Company
settings.text: Opera Beds are a great company that can not do enough for you!! I would highly recommend them. They are helpful and knowledgeable about the products they sell and the staff are lovely. Their prices are also competitive and delivery is next day with most items.

settings.title: Richard Edwards | Care Home Manager
settings.heading: Top Quality
settings.text: Most reliable company I have come across. Polite, I get quotes fast, I get great prices, when they tell me a day it will arrive it does so. The products are always of top quality and prices are always the best in the market place. I look forward to continuing our great working relationship for many years to come.

settings.title: Ian Rainford | Hospitality Owner
settings.heading: Brilliant Service
settings.text: We have received brilliant customer service from Opera over the last 5 years since we opened our accessible holiday cottages here in Lancashire.  They have delivered the quality beds at specific times when we have needed them...even within 2 days notice! Thank you team and keep up the great work.

settings.title: Moira Hay | Care Manager
settings.heading: Polite and Helpful
settings.text: Equipment was received when planned, and regular follow up phone calls received. Information in relation to trials and research was sent through to us. Staff were always polite and helpful.

settings.title: Billy Finnie | Specialist Retailer
settings.heading: Value Adding Partner
settings.text: It’s a real pleasure working with the team. The quality and range of products and highly efficient service makes them a truly value adding supplies partner.

settings.title: Kaye Hill | Care Administrator
settings.heading: Very Easy to Deal With
settings.text: We use Opera to supply all of our beds, mattresses, pumps etc. They are very easy to deal with, know the subject matter and delivery is exceptional.

settings.title: Isabel Mendoza | User
settings.heading: Best Beds and Mattresses
settings.text: I cannot speak highly enough about this wonderful company, apart from the most beautiful and comfortable beds, their mattresses are so comfortable and well made. With their lovely mattresses you will have the best night sleep for the rest of your life. Thank you Opera so much for everything.

settings.title: Jim E | User
settings.heading: Never Had a Better Nights Sleep
settings.text: Opera Beds provided us with an excellent and very comfortable new bed. The bed looks great and all the functions are better than we imagined. Everything is excellent and above all a great product. Never had a better nights sleep…thank you Opera Beds.

settings.title: Pam Spencer | User
settings.heading: Excellent Customer Service
settings.text: Ordered the bed on Monday and it was delivered and installed on the Friday. The old bed and all packaging removed. Michelle was very helpful, superb Customer Service and I would strongly recommend.

settings.title: Jacky Fitzsimons | User
settings.heading: Good Advice and Service
settings.text: Good advice & service from ordering through to delivery. We are very pleased with the quality & finish of the product & will recommend Opera Beds to family & friends.

settings.title: Jennifer West | Family Member
settings.heading: Made Such A Difference For My Mum
settings.text: Opera were so informative and helped me to choose the best bed and mattress for my sick Mum! The bed and mattress have made such a difference to Mums comfort and also my back as I can raise the bed up when I need to manoeuvre Mum! Worth every penny!!

settings.title: Sarah | Family Member
settings.heading: My Mother is Very Comfortable
settings.text: My mother has Dementia and we were looking to get a bed to suit to her current needs. I ordered a low bed from Opera beds as I initially thought this would be best. The world of dementia care and knowing what is suitable can be so confusing and I really appreciate the service of this company. I opted for a standard bed and it's just what we needed. mother is also very comfortable and loves her new bed!

settings.title: Pauline | User
settings.heading: Could not be more impressed with Opera…
settings.text: Could not be more impressed with Opera Beds, placed an order for an electric adjustable bed on Tuesday it was delivered on Wednesday fully assembled Just had to fit legs and headboard, plug in and ready to go.

settings.title: Danusia Smallman | User
settings.heading: Professional, Friendly and Efficient
settings.text: Delivery was on time as per notified schedule. The delivery company very professional, friendly and efficient. Product is excellent, as described and meets our requirements.

settings.title: Mary O'Brien | Family Member
settings.heading: Well Made and Looks Attractive
settings.text: I bought a profile bed for my husband who has Parkinson's disease. It's made a massive difference to our lives. The bed itself is well made and is looks attractive and the controls are easy to use. All in all this is an excellent buy that has exceeded our expectations.

settings.title: Peter Page | Family Member
settings.heading: Sturdy Build and Looks Nice
settings.text: I bought a profiling bed for my dad and it’s perfect. The bed itself is excellent. Sturdy build, looks nice and operates really well. The design makes it looks like an ordinary bed but its functions have helped my dad sleep better than he has been for years.

settings.heading: Top 3 Company in Sector on Trustpilot

settings.title: Joy Tickle - Tissue Viability Nurse
settings.paragraph: Meet Joy Tickle, an Independent Tissue Viability Nurse Consultant with over 35 years working in the NHS and community. Joy has worked closely with some of our pressure care products, giving her clinical guidance and assessment based on her experiences in practice.

settings.title: Sarah Cooke - Occupational Therapist
settings.paragraph: Meet Sarah Cooke, an independent occupational therapist with specialisms in physical rehabilitation and postural management. Sarah has clinically reviewed a selection of our profiling beds and works with clients across community care, helping them to remain independent and ensuring they are properly supported.

settings.title: Rapid, Effortless Delivery
settings.text: Our comprehensive delivery network allows us to deliver and install our products quickly and efficiently across the UK and Ireland. As standard we offer next day delivery on our products.

settings.title: Old Bed & Mattress Removal
settings.text: Let us take care of removing your old bed and mattress and disposal. Removal cost for a bed and mattress is £95.00 with VAT relief, simply add this to your basket at checkout.

settings.title: Looked After for Life
settings.text: Our generous warranty terms are backed with an extensive team of engineers should you ever need them after your purchase. Our dedicated customer care team are also able to assist via phone or email and respond to all enquiries quickly and efficiently.

settings.title: Why Opera?
settings.paragraph: We are a leading British manufacturer dedicated to stylish design and the power of technology to create beds and mattresses that enhance lives, promote health and deliver comfort.

settings.title: Do you need your bed to raise and lower?
How firm do you like your mattress?
Superior Quality
settings.panel_1_paragraph: When buying a bed from Opera, you can be assured of maximum quality and attention to detail. Beds are constructed for durability and smooth operation, and finished with care and finesse to look at home in any bedroom.
settings.panel_2_heading: Need help choosing your new bed?
settings.panel_2_paragraph: Whether it's an adjustable bed or a new mattress your looking to buy, our team of dedicated experts are here to help choose the perfect product.
settings.panel_2_additional_text: You can also chat with us instantly.

settings.title: We'll take your old bed away
Talk to an Expert
settings.paragraph: Get expert advice with our needs based consultation over the phone. Call our advisors now on 0333 222 8584 or request a call back below.

settings.title: Request a Brochure
settings.paragraph: Discover our full product range in our latest brochure. Request to receive by post or email by completing the form linked to below.

settings.title: Assess Online
settings.paragraph: Answer questions in our online assessment to help you choose a bed that is right for you. The assessment takes approximately 5 minutes to complete.

settings.title: Ways to find your perfect bed...

settings.embed: Trustpilot

settings.title: Top 3 Company in Sector on TrustPilot
Why choose Opera?
settings.paragraph: With over 15 years’ experience, we've mastered our craft in providing quality beds that balance elegant design with functionality.

settings.title: Courier Palletised Delivery
settings.sub_heading: 2-3 WORKING DAYS = FREE | NEXT DAY DELIVERY = £50
settings.paragraph: Your goods will arrive on a pallet by courier service for you to assemble. The shipment will be dropped outside as close to your property as possible. Next working day available for all orders of stocked goods placed by 3pm on Monday to Friday.

settings.title: Premium 2-Man Installation
settings.paragraph: Your bed will be delivered and installed in your home by a 2-man crew within 4-7 working days of purchasing. You will be given a delivery date when you order and will receive a call from the installation crew 1 hour before delivery.

settings.title: Old Bed and Mattress Removal
settings.sub_heading: £95 WITH VAT RELIEF | PURCHASE WITH INSTALLATION
settings.paragraph: The 2-man installation crew will dismantle and remove your old bed and mattress before installing your new bed. The old items will be taken away and either sustainably disposed or donated to charity depending on condition.

settings.heading: Rapid Home Delivery & Setup
settings.paragraph_1: Our industry-leading logistics and engineer network enables us to offer fast, efficient delivery and support.

settings.title: Fantastic Service
settings.review_content: Fantastic service from the moment I called. Very knowledgeable and took a true interest in myself and my needs. The two guys that delivered were very friendly and installed the bed in a very professional manner. All in all everyone and everything was spot on. Recommend 100%

settings.title: Brilliant Service
settings.review_content: We have received brilliant service from Opera over the last 5 years since we opened our holiday cottages. We have purchased adjustable beds and they have delivered the quality products at specific times when we have needed them. Thank you team - keep up the great work.

settings.title: Fantastic Service
settings.review_content: My father-in-law has been searching the internet for some time to find a bed he feels comfortable in. He has had many sleepless nights, until, that is, we found the right bed from OPERA. At last he has slept every night since we had the bed delivered.

settings.vat_relief_link_text: Find out if you are eligible for VAT relief.
settings.vat_relief_text_html:
If you are purchasing for personal use or a family member and you/they have a recognised long-term medical condition or are registered disabled, then you pay 0% VAT on your order with us. Simply complete the adjacent form with your name and medical condition and VAT will be removed from your order.

In proceeding you understand that, by completing this form and processing this order, you are digitally signing to agree that the details you have provided above qualify for relief from value added tax. If you are in any doubt as to whether you are eligible for VAT relief, click here to read the full advice and guidance on the Gov.uk website.
settings.charity_text_html: Claiming as a charity? Call us on 0333 222 8584

settings.title: Trusted Experts
settings.heading: Trusted Experts
settings.text: Opera has long been recognised as the trusted experts for adjustable beds and mattresses across care, hospitality and consumer sectors. Established in 2004, our founding family started out with hundreds of years of combined experience from furniture, care and manufacturing industries, determined to take a fresh approach and embrace much-needed style and technology.

settings.heading: A Fresh Approach
settings.text: A bed is an investment that can transform quality of sleep and promote good health. It is the centre-piece of the bedroom. That's why every Opera product has been thoughtfully designed to provide optimum comfort, incorporate smart technology and compliment bedroom interiors, ensuring your investment is one well made.

settings.title: Committed to British
settings.heading: Committed to Quality British Design & Manufacturing
settings.text:
All of our products are designed in the UK by our experienced design team. Quality is guaranteed through carefully selected raw materials, stringent testing and real-life product trials.

We are committed to balancing clinical functionality with leading, attractive design. Every bed has design options including wood finishes, materials, colours and headboard styles.

settings.title: Personal Advice
settings.heading: Expert Advice and Guidance from a Personal Adviser
settings.text: Buying an adjustable bed and mattress is a life-changing investment and we help all of our customers to make the best choices for their needs. Through a 20-minute consultation call, we will ask you a series of questions and assess your needs to recommend the products that will best suit you now and in the future.

settings.title: Contract & Trade
settings.heading: Contract Customers
settings.subheading: Trusted by Retirement Developers, Care Providers and the Hospitality Sector
settings.text: We work with providers and developers across the care, retirement, hospitality and leisure sectors. Some of the UK's leading care groups have trusted Opera for years whilst more recent clients include progressive hotel and leisure developers wanting to broaden their appeal and offer guests a unique experience.

settings.title: Effortless Delivery
settings.heading: Efficient, effortless delivery
settings.panel_1_text: Our comprehensive delivery network allows us to deliver and install our products quickly and efficiently across the UK and Ireland. Next day courier delivery is offered free as standard and engineer installations are a super fast 2-3 days across mainland UK.
settings.panel_2_heading: We'll Take Your Old Bed Away
settings.panel_2_text: Let us take care of removing your old bed/s when we install your new one. Our engineer crews will dismantle, remove and prepare the bed for safe disposal. Beds in good condition are donated to our partner charities.

settings.title: Support & After Care
settings.heading: Dedicated After Care and In-Home Support with UK Engineer Network
settings.text: Every bed comes with a parts and labour warranty that comes into effect on the day of delivery. Should you have any questions or need on-site assistance, we have a dedicated product support team which can help you by phone or arrange an engineer visit through our extensive UK engineer network. Our average site visit response time is 36 hours.

settings.heading: Enhancing Lives, Delivering Comfort
settings.text: Welcome to Opera, a leading British manufacturer dedicated to stylish design and the power of technology to create beds and mattresses that enhance lives, promote health and deliver comfort.

settings.heading: A family run company
settings.text:
Opera is a family run company which started in 2004. With years of experience working with care operators and users, we have become established as trusted experts in care beds and mattresses for the UK long-term care sector.

We design and manufacture a range of quality beds and are passionate about improving the lives of carers and persons in care. We work with care providers, carers, designers, end users and family members who want to ensure outstanding care in a homely, pleasant environment.

settings.heading: People that care for each other and our customers
settings.text: We are a passionate, driven team that look out for each other and work together to serve our customers. Every day we stay true to our vision of Enhancing Lives, Delivering Comfort by not only developing and providing life-changing products but also taking a genuine interest and care of our customers and their needs. New members who join us do so because they reflect these values and are a valued addition to our team.

settings.panel_1_text: We always speak sensitively and with consideration and ensure we always consider people’s needs and what is right for them. We always make sure our customers feel comfortable and supported when they speak to us.
settings.panel_2_text: We listen carefully and acknowledged information that is given to us. We are always friendly and willing to help our customers and colleagues. We ensure we encourage others and always show our appreciation
settings.panel_3_text: We are committed and go the extra mile to deliver great outcomes and always look for a solution to any problems that arise. We are proactive and ensure we do what is right. We speak positively to help people and inspire others.
settings.panel_4_text: We are always looking for the best way of doing things and how to improve. We take ownership and use efficient working ways to ensure our time is well spent to always deliver results and work to the highest quality.

settings.vacancy_text: We are looking for an experienced Quality Assurance Compliance Specialist to join the team to ensure that documents meet the organisation’s needs...

we have an exciting opportunity for an experienced Finance Manager to control the finance function of the business to ensure accuracy of the accounts, by budget control, correct expense approvals and allocations...
We have an exciting opportunity for a National Business Development Manager to join the Opera team to develop and grow new business opportunities in local authorities and the NHS.
We have an exciting opportunity for a telemarketing lead researcher and generator to join the team to develop and grow new business opportunities...
An exciting opportunity to develop the online presence and grow online direct to consumer sales by increasing web visitor traffic and improving traffic to lead conversions...

settings.title: Michelle Winter
settings.content: I’m part of a really good team with a great team spirit, it’s rewarding work, improving customers lives and they really appreciate it.

settings.title: Steve Murray
settings.content: The support you get from the Opera team is second to none.  The team really do care about making a difference to peoples' lives.

settings.title: Sophie Millard
settings.review_title: Proud to be Part of the Team
settings.content: I feel proud when I say I am part of the Opera team. We all care for one another and take a genuine interest in how we all contribute to improving the lives of others. Everyone is so welcoming and friendly.

settings.heading: Modern Offices and Showroom Facility
settings.text: Our modern offices and showroom are located at our premises in Hull, East Yorkshire. Our office space is kitted out with various areas to work, a fully equipped and stylish boardroom and individual booths.

settings.heading: Conveniently located
settings.text: Kingswood enjoys excellent access from the road network with the A1079 (Beverley Bypass) and A1165 (Hull North to Centre) both meeting in the district, and has one of the city's main bus terminals. Hull Paragon and Beverley rail stations are also nearby.

settings.heading: Large range of nearby amenities
settings.text: Our head offices and main distribution centre are located within walking distance of Kingswood Retail and Leisure Park where there is an excellent selection of amenities.

settings.heading: What you can expect from visiting the showroom
settings.bullet_list:
One-on-one support from a dedicated adviser
Try beds and mattresses before purchasing
Light refreshments (tea, coffee and biscuits)
See and feel our full range of fabric and wood colour swatches
Brochures to take away with you if required
Full disabled access and washroom facilities

settings.heading: Call Us to Arrange Your Visit
settings.form_embed_html: Call our team on 0333 222 8584 to check availability and arrange your visit. You will be assigned a dedicated advisor who can demonstrate the beds and help you to find the best bed and mattress for your needs.

settings.heading: Where to find us
settings.text:
The Opera Care Bed & Mattress Showroom is located at Kingswood Retail & Leisure Park in Hull, East Yorkshire.

Kingswood enjoys excellent access from the road network with the A1079 (Beverley Bypass) and A1165 (Hull North to Centre) both meeting in the district, and has one of the city's main bus terminals.

settings.embed: Trustpilot

settings.intro_text:
Our showroom is located at Kingswood Retail & Leisure Park in Hull, East Yorkshire. The showroom has full disabled access and visitors are encouraged to browse and try the comprehensive range of Opera beds, mattresses and accessories we have on display.

The showroom is open from 9am - 4pm and you are required to book an appointment before visiting as you will be assigned a personal product adviser that can discuss your needs and demonstrate relevant products.

settings.heading: Bespoke bed design to suit your brand and care home
settings.text:
All Opera beds are led by design, resulting in a stylish, high quality product without compromising the medical functionality that care beds feature.

Our Bed Design Service enables you to provide exceptional care to all your residents without compromising your care home’s interior design schemes. Learn more about our Bed Design Service and get started.

settings.heading: Beds to fit with your environments and unique interior design
settings.text:
The interior design of a care home can contribute towards a healthy, positive living environment that stimulates residents and encourages interaction. This is especially true in the bedrooms of the residents where they spend a lot of their time, and the bed itself can play a huge part in this.

Speak to us to learn more about how we can assist with the interior designs of your bedrooms.

settings.heading: We offer product trials so your residents can test it out for themselves first
settings.text:
We understand that choosing a bed and mattress supplier for your care home can be difficult, which is why we offer trials on most of our beds and mattresses. Trial a bed and mattress in your care home and give your carers and residents the chance to test them for suitability.

Contact us today to discuss your requirements.

settings.heading: Online ordering portal, offering discounts, advice and speed
settings.text:
Approved Opera Care customers qualify for discounted pricing on the whole Opera range of beds, mattresses and accessories. This also gives you preferential access to stock, free next day delivery and unbiased advice from our highly trained support teams.

Order Online with Care Home Discounts

Log in to your company account to place secure, online orders at your discounted pricing. View your order history and place repeat orders at the click of a button.

settings.page_content: View some of our recent work with Care Homes, Residential Homes and Specialist Facilities to help them improve the care they provide for their residents. You can also see some of our bespoke designed care beds for some of the more premium care homes in the UK.

settings.intro_text: Create a bed completely unique to your room/scheme with our bespoke bed design service. Our highly skilled British design and production teams are well-known for their exacting standards and real attention-to-detail and with access to thousands of materials we can create any design imaginable.

settings.heading: Headboards
settings.text: An array of headboard tufting styles from classics to on-trend modern designs.

settings.heading: Upholstery
settings.text: Have your bed upholstered in our wide range of fabrics including various colours in linen and leather to suit any interior.

settings.heading: Wood Finishes
settings.text: Choose from a range of textures, grains and colours including coated matte finishes.
Choose from hundreds of options. Call us on {number} to create your very own bespoke bed.

settings.heading: Discover
settings.text: Be inspired by our house designs, explore beds elsewhere and make a list of your requirements.

settings.heading: Consultation
settings.text: Speak with one of our personal advisers to discuss your needs and bespoke requirements.

settings.heading: Specify
settings.text: Receive fabric/finish samples and bespoke drawings before confirming your bespoke design.

settings.heading: Crafted
settings.text: Our production team will craft your bed to your exact specification.

settings.heading: The Bespoke Bed Process
settings.footer_text: Once your bed has passed its quality check our extensive network of couriers will deliver the bed as soon as possible. From initial consultation to delivery our bespoke service is around 6-8 weeks.

settings.title: Headboards
settings.text: Whether you are wanting a traditional headboard style or something that is futuristic and out of this world we can do just that. Our highly skilled designers and upholsterers can turn your vision into your very own unique headboard. Share your design or inspiration with us to begin your bespoke bed journey.

settings.title: Materials
settings.text: We have an extensive selection of luxurious fabrics to choose from. However, should you want your bed upholstered is a different fabric outside our range, we can make that happen. Speak with us to learn more about our range of fabrics and colours, or request a fabric sample to have sent out to you in the post.

settings.title: Finishes
settings.text: Add the perfect final touches to your bed that’s chosen by you and made by us. Choose your feet for your bed, if you want storage and add any extras to complete your bed. We will always ensure we can fulfil your requirements and all beds are quality checked to perfection before coming home to you.

settings.heading: Create Endless Possibilities
settings.features_text: Why not take advantage of our completely bespoke design service which allows you to create your bed exactly how you want it. Share your ideas and inspiration, choose your fabrics and we’ll take care of the rest. If you are looking for a bed that’s extra special then talk to us and see how you can design your dream bed
settings.announcement_text: Speak to us about our Bespoke Design Service. Call us on {number}

settings.image_accessibility: Bespoke Care Home Profiling Bed Staffordshire
Dark Wood Care Home Bed Merseyside

settings.heading: The Bespoke Bed Process
settings.footer_text: Our production team will craft your bed to your exact specification.

settings.title: Apply for a Care Home Login
settings.text: If your care organisation is interested in becoming a contract customer to benefit from discounted pricing and simple online ordering, call us on 0333 222 8584 and we will gladly assist.

settings.cp_title: Secure Online Ordering at Your Discounted Pricing
settings.cp_text:
Approved Opera customers receive personalised discounted pricing across the full Opera® range of beds and mattresses. Approved customers also have access to our extensive range of carefully selected care equipment which includes hoists, slings, transfer aid and much more.

If you have an existing account with our Order Portal you can log in here to view and order at your discounted price rates. 

- View your discounted pricing across the whole Opera range
- Easy, secure online ordering
- View your order history and status
- Favourable delivery terms

Not yet set up? Apply for your free account setup to our exclusive Order Portal below.

settings.form_text: Fill out this short form and we’ll be back in touch with you within 2 working hours.
settings.form_subject:
I'm interested in purchasing an Opera product

I already have an Opera product and need support

Other
settings.showroom_text:
Our showroom is located at Kingswood Retail & Leisure Park in Hull, East Yorkshire. The showroom has full disabled access and visitors are encouraged to browse and try the comprehensive range of Opera beds, mattresses and accessories we have on display.

The showroom is open from 9am - 4pm and you are required to book an appointment before visiting as you will be assigned a personal product adviser that can discuss your needs and demonstrate relevant products.

settings.title: How quickly can I get my item?
settings.content: All orders of stocked goods are delivered next day by standard if you choose to have doorstep or kerbside courier delivery. For larger items such as beds or chairs that you wish to have installed by our engineers, we can service the majority of UK areas within 4-7 working days of ordering. Find out more about delivery and installation.

settings.title: How do I know whether an item is in stock?
settings.content: Thanks to 5 UK stock holdings, we are able to stock all products in the Opera® range. For products where there are multiple configurations such as upholstery colours, please call our customer care team on 0333 222 8584 to check availability.

settings.title: Can I buy products for my own home?
settings.content: Yes, Opera work with both care homes and private buyers living in their own homes. Click to view our hospital beds and pressure care mattresses. If you need any help at all, please call 0333 222 8584 and we'll be more than happy to help.

settings.title: Do you deliver/install on a weekend?
settings.content: We can arrange doorstep/kerbside courier deliveries for a Saturday, however engineer installations are only avaliable on weekdays (Monday to Friday).

settings.title: How do I place an order with you?
settings.content: You can place your order online, over the phone or by email. Find out more about ordering on our helpful How to Order Page.

settings.title: How do I get VAT relief on a product?
settings.content: To purchase an item VAT free, you must be purchasing the item for personal use (not for care home or business use) and you must be either registered disabled or have a named medical condition (e.g. Alzheimer's, Parkinson's). You pay without VAT and fill out a qualifying form to prove your eligibility. Find out more in our helpful VAT relief guide.

settings.title: Can I return an item if it isn't suitable?
settings.content: Yes you can. If you find the product isn't suitable after it has been delivered, please contact our customer care team within 14 days of receipt of the goods. Providing it is unused and in its original packaging, the item will be collected and you will recieve a full refund. Please read our Returns Policy for more information.

settings.title: Can I hire a bed from you?
settings.content: We do not provide hire services for any of our profiling care beds or mattresses. However, you can find more information on how to hire a profiling bed here: Bed & Mattress Hire Page.

settings.title: Do you buy back beds when they are no longer needed?
settings.content: We no longer provide a buy back scheme. However to assist with the removal of your bed, you could sell or donate your bed to another company or individual that would be willing to collect it from you. We are always looking to support our customers, so if you need more advice on how to go about selling or donating your bed, please call our team on 0333 222 8584.

settings.title: How can I see or try out your products?
settings.content: We have an equipment showroom in Hull, East Yorkshire that is open for appointments Monday to Friday 8:30am - 4:30pm. Call us on 0333 222 8584 to book your appointment. If this is not practical, we offer a 10-day trial period in your home that allows you to check the suitability of a product and also have an over-the-phone advisory team that can show you videos and discuss your needs in more detail.

settings.title: Do you manufacture your own beds, mattresses and chairs?
settings.content: Opera Beds is the manufacturer of all Opera® products. Components and initial manufacturing is done in global locations including Europe, Eastern Asia and the British Isles. Assembly before dispatch is all carried out at our main UK site in East Yorkshire.

settings.title: How do I find out more about a product?
settings.content: If you need more information or technical advice on a product that isn't listed on our website or brochure, please call our helpful advisers on 0333 222 8584.

settings.title: Why should I buy Opera® products?
settings.content:
Opera® beds, chairs and mattresses are becoming well established with UK care providers, carers and consumers because of three key qualities:
- Opera® products have been thoughtfully designed to encompass varying care needs and maximise medical/health benefits. Approved by the NHS.
- Build method and materials are uncompromising in quality which is confidently backed by generous warranty terms.
- Opera® is perhaps best known for balancing care functionality with elegant, homely design.

Add to these, Opera Beds have one of the highest service levels of any UK care equipment provider with an outstanding, reliable logistics network and a highly rated, skilled customer care team. View our Trustpilot rating.

settings.heading: Repayment Calculator
settings.finance_footer: The approval of your application depends on your financial circumstances and borrowing history, so do the terms you may be offered. Opera Beds acts as a credit broker and not the lender. Klarna Finance acts as the lender.

settings.title: Applicant must be 18 years or over at the date of application
Retired from regular employment. Minimum age 50
In regular, permanent employment working a minimum of 16 hours per week. (Including students)

settings.heading: Klarna Q&A
settings.text:
How do I manage my account?
You can review your latest Klarna invoices at your leisure by logging onto klarna.com.

Will I be accepted for finance?
You must be at least 18 years old to use Klarna payment services and they're offered subject to your financial circumstances. Klarna uses a 'soft credit search' to assess who is eligible, but don't worry, this doesn't affect your credit rating.

When do I have to pay?
You'll receive an email with payment instructions 2 days after your order is confirmed, depending on your chosen method. We'll also send a little reminder a couple days before payment is due.


Opera Beds acts as an introducer and not a lender of unregulated credit products provided by Klarna Bank AB (publ). Credit is only available to permanent UK residents aged 18+, subject to status, T&Cs apply. Please note Pay in 30 days and Pay in 3 instalments is not regulated by the FCA. Please spend responsibly. Borrowing more than you can afford could seriously affect your financial status. Make sure you can afford your monthly repayments on time.

settings.heading: Apply for Klarna Finance when you go to checkout, or process your application by phone.
Can we support you with your project?
settings.text:
We've been working with designers and specifiers for years to bring visions to reality and make bedrooms a truly pleasant environment to live in and be cared for. Our highly skilled UK production team are well-known for their exacting standards and real attention-to-detail and with access to thousands of materials we can create any design imaginable.

Whether you’re planning a new build, a refurbishment or a renovation of an existing site, selecting an Opera bed will help your bedrooms stand out to potential new guests, residents and their families. Let's get started...

settings.embed: Trustpilot

settings.title: Get in touch with Opera
settings.description: Fill out this short form and we’ll be back in touch with you within 2 working hours.

settings.strapline: Discover our latest work with care providers which include residential homes, care homes and specialist facilities. Over the years we have worked with some of the UK’s most premium care homes, supplying unique profiling beds using our bespoke design service. Our dedicated care home team support individual care providers to help facilitate outstanding care for residents.

settings.title: Trusted by the UK Care Sector
settings.description: We’re proud to work with some of the UK’s leading care providers that are committed to providing exceptional care. We ensure our profiling beds are thoughtfully designed whilst ensuring medical functionality remains prominent to facilitate outstanding care. Our extensive portfolio of profiling beds and mattresses cater for a wide variety of care needs, and our pressure care products ensure users are supported and comfortable whilst receiving effective pressure relieving care.

settings.title: Refurbishment & New Build Developments
settings.description: We have a wealth of experience supplying beds, mattresses, and accessories to brand new care establishments. We work with interior designers and project teams, to ensure resident needs are met whilst considering the interior scheme. We also work closely with providers during refurbishments, our team are on hand to support projects of all size. Speak with us today about our services for supporting new developments/refurbishments.

settings.title: Pressure Care Expertise
settings.description: We partner with experts across the care and health sector, helping to make our products the best they can be. We recently partnered with Tissue Viability Nurse Consultant, Joy Tickle. With over 35 years’ experience working within the NHS and community, Joy has worked with us on our pressure care portfolio giving her clinical guidance and assessment based on her experiences in practice.

settings.title: Bespoke Design Service
settings.description: Our bespoke design service provides endless options to create a profiling bed to fit any interior scheme, whilst still having the medical functionality for varying care needs. We don’t compromise on style and believe a warming and homely design can have a positive impact on resident wellbeing. Find out more on our bespoke design service by speaking with our team.

settings.title: Try Our Products
settings.description: We provide a trial service across our products where our care home customers can try a product before committing to purchase. Throughout the year, we exhibit at several care show events where we showcase new and existing products led by our care home team. On-site trials can also be arranged where our team visit the home, giving providers the opportunity to try our products first-hand.

settings.title: Next Day Delivery
settings.description: We provide rapid next day delivery on all orders of stocked items placed by 3pm, ensuring our products arrive for when they are needed. We also provide preferential access to stock and each of our care home customers are supported by their own account manager, helping you to respond quickly to hospital discharges and changes in resident needs.

settings.title: Get in touch with Opera
settings.description: Fill out this short form and we’ll be back in touch with you within 2 working hours.

settings.hero_description: Discover Opera beds and mattresses with a virtual video call into our showroom and get live advice and support from a dedicated adviser.
settings.box_1: 1-to-1 expert advice with a dedicated adviser
settings.box_2: Discover beds from the comfort of your home

settings.title: How it works
settings.b1_description: Use the booking tool below to pick a suitable date and time for your visit. You will be automatically assigned an adviser after booking or there is an option to pre-select your adviser if you have a preference.
settings.b2_description: Once you have booked, you will be emailed with a calendar invite and a video link in preparation for your virtual visit. You will also receive a reminder email one hour before your scheduled visit.
settings.b3_description: At your selected time, one of our advisers will be ready for you on the video link to take you around our showroom, discuss your needs and go through applicable products with you. Enjoy your visit!

settings.title: Michelle Winter
settings.job_description: Experienced and caring, Michelle will guide you through the full process of selecting a bed for home.

settings.title: Harry Arnett
settings.job_description: With a wealth of expert knowledge,  Harry works with individuals, their family and care teams to specify beds.

settings.title: Sophie Millard
settings.job_description: Sophie is a former carer and  helps individuals and family members to choose suitable beds for support at home.

settings.title: Keira Longthorp
settings.job_description: Keira has experience working for the Ambulance service and can help choose the most suitable beds for home.

settings.title: Dan Clark
settings.job_description: As contracts manager, Dan works with care providers and developers to help create leading care environments.

settings.title: Roxanne Hargreaves
settings.job_description: Friendly and helpful, Roxanne assists care homes with equipment for residents and new admissions.

settings.title: Steve Murray
settings.job_description: Dependable and supportive, Steve looks after care operators and staff providing sales advice and support.
